entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
